objects.src: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080'><defs><linearGradient id='grad1' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#263C28;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#345E39;stop-opacity:1'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='grad2' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='0%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFC107;stop-opacity:0.8'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#FFC107;stop-opacity:0'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='#F5F7F5'/><rect x='40' y='40' width='1000' height='1000' rx='20' stroke='#345E39' stroke-width='3' fill='none' opacity='0.7'/><rect x='60' y='60' width='960' height='960' rx='15' stroke='#345E39' stroke-width='1' fill='none' opacity='0.5'/><path d='M0,200 C250,170 400,270 550,300 C750,340 900,290 1080,350 L1080,0 L0,0 Z' fill='url(#grad1)' opacity='0.7'/><path d='M0,880 C150,920 350,850 550,900 C750,950 900,880 1080,950 L1080,1080 L0,1080 Z' fill='url(#grad1)' opacity='0.7'/><path d='M900,700 L1000,700 L1080,780 L1080,880 L1000,880 L900,880 Z' fill='#FFC107' opacity='0.15'/><path d='M180,200 L280,200 L280,300 L180,300 Z' fill='#FFC107' opacity='0.15'/><rect x='100' y='100' width='880' height='880' rx='10' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.8)' opacity='0.7'/></svg>

objects.text:
• Undestructable Polycarbonate Shell
• Lightweight 40L Storage Capacity
• Silent Run 8-Wheel Technology
• USB Port & TSA Lock Included

product_details.description: Accessibility just made a move to the next level. No cap. Our classic Cabin Luggage has now evolved! The Cabin Pro is designed for quick access to help you breeze through security. UNDESTRUCTABLE GERMAN MARKLON POLYCARBONATE SHELL: Casing: Hard LIGHTWEIGHT & INDUSTRY BEST STORAGE: Capacity: 40liter, Weight: 3.65 grams, Dimension : 57.8 x 37 x 24.3 cm SILENT RUN JAPANESE WHEEL TECHNOLOGY: Number of wheels: 8, Super Smooth Hinomoto Wheels THE MOST FEATURE RICH LUGGAGE: USB Port: 1, Powerbank not included, Lock Type: TSA Number Lock, Comes with magic eraser, Dust Bag & Laundry Bag Water resistant: Yes Outer material - Polycarbonate ** Water resistance level - Water Resistant ** Country of Origin - India **

banner_details:
This promotional banner is designed with a modern and clean layout that highlights a travel product. It includes a bold title text layer labeled `"heading"` placed prominently at the top-left, followed by a standout `"subheading"` in contrasting yellow to catch attention. Directly beneath this is a slim decorative line `"decorative"`, also in yellow, adding visual balance. The `"description"` text layer lists key product features in a clean, bullet-point format. The bottom-left area displays the pricing with `"price"` in bold font. A call-to-action button (`"cta_button"`) and its text (`"cta"`) invite conversion. A luggage image (`"product_image"`) anchors the right side, creating visual interest.

**Color Palette:**
- Rich Forest Green: `#263C28`
- Deep Olive Green: `#345E39`
- Vibrant Mustard Yellow: `#FFC107`
- Soft White: `#F5F7F5`
- Neutral Charcoal: `#333333`
product_color: The product image features a stylish suitcase with a sophisticated and modern color palette. Dominantly, it showcases a deep army green exterior (#4A5A44), complemented by vibrant mustard yellow accents (#F4B400). The interior lining pops with a lighter grid-patterned yellow (#FFD84D), adding visual interest and contrast. Matte black elements (#2B2B2B) on the handle and wheels ground the design. The green and yellow blend seamlessly, utilizing the yellow to highlight zippers, trim, and interior details, making functional elements stand out. This palette is ideal for an advertisement banner targeting modern travelers seeking style and functionality in one compact product.
